Role Description

This is a full-time on-site role located in Santa Clarita, CA for a General Manager. The General Manager will be responsible for managing and overseeing the day-to-day operations of the research company, including financial operations, staff management, and quality assurance. The General Manager will also be responsible for creating and implementing policies and procedures and collaborating with other departments to ensure efficient and effective clinical research operations.

Qualifications

Leadership, management, and problem-solving skills

Excellent written and verbal communication skills

Experience in clinical research operations and compliance regulations

Knowledge of financial management and budgeting

Strong organizational and project management skills

Bachelor's degree in a relevant field, with an advanced degree preferred

Experience in managing teams and supervising staff

Knowledge of quality assurance principles and practices

Ability to work collaboratively and build relationships with other departments, sponsors, and CROs

Commitment to empathy and participant-centered research

Company Description

Amicis Research Center is an organization that values "Enthusiasm, Motivation, and Empathy" in the field of clinical research. Our team includes research assistants, study coordinators, study nurses, and physicians who are committed to fulfilling the desires of every protocol with enthusiasm and motivation. Above all, we prioritize empathy towards our research participants and strive to offer transparency, confidence, and genuine relationships. Through our mantra, we collaborate and contribute to healthcare.
